title: Low Gas Prices Expected To Continue As Crude Oil Drops To $58 A Barrel
teaser: The price of oil fell again on Friday morning. The price of West Texas Intermediate, the U..S. benchmark, dipped below $60 a barrel after news the International Energy Agency had cut its demand forecast for 2015.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
